```{r}
# Add up V
addEm <- function(v){
sum <- 0  
for(k in 1:length(v))
sum <- sum + v[k]
return(sum)
}
```{r}
# addEm test
addEm(1:5)
addEm(1:10)
```

```{r}
# newaddEm
newaddEm <- function(v){
if(length(v)==0){ 
return(0)}
return(v[1]+newaddEm(v[-1]))
}
```{r}
# newaddEm test
newaddEm(1:5)
newaddEm(1:10)
```
